name: Tumblr - Finchel icon set
description: Replace your Tumblr icons with a star, Rachel's "Big Apple" necklace, a crown (for their prom queen and king win), a football, and a bouquet (in honour of their scenes in "I Do")!

user.name: GeekintheJeep
user.about:
A 24-year old geek who happens to have inadvertently stumbled into this Tumblr editing stuff.

Contact me here or on Tumblr (GeekintheJeep) with any questions or requests!

additional_info: Contact me on Tumblr (GeekintheJeep) with any questions/problems/requests. The Finchel logo shown in the second picture was also made by me, and can be found here - [x] Edited 12/09/14: I've updated the code so it should be working with Tumblr's new update. Please note that the football will only appear if you have XKit installed. I went back and forth for a long while on whether to take this set down in the wake of Cory's death. In the end, I've chosen to leave it up as a way to celebrate an actor who changed so many lives during his time on our TV screen, and a character who was an inspiration for many.
